import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import styles from "./Form.module.css"; function Form(){ const allPokemons = useSelector((state)=>state.allPokemons) const [input,setInput] = useState({ name:"", life:"", strength:"", defense:"", speed:"", height:"", weight:"", img:"", type: [] }) function handleChange(e){ setInput({ ...input, [e.target.name] : e.target.value }) } return(
